website_summaries.verdict: Choose it if its burlap design fits your décor; otherwise, the Brentwood is a well-made option at a budget price.
pros: Burlap cover with a textured appearance
Neutral color and drum shape fit numerous styles
cons: It feels a bit less sturdy than some other models

customer_reviews.title: and this was the perfect item to personalize and modernize
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a retro floor lamp I got at a flea market, and this was the perfect item to personalize and modernize. Other reviews said the weave was not as tight and too much light came through. I think it's just perfect, and lights up the room in a very homey way when it's the only light on.
customer_reviews.author: PearlMac

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shade for a vintage lamp base I found in an antique store. The burlap cover is great for the vintage vibe of the lamp. It is also a loose weave so it allows a lot of light to get through the burlap. The price compared to other shades I look at is very reasonable. It was packed well and is very sturdy. I would highly recommend this product to anyone needing a good quality shade at a competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: S Max  Jones

customer_reviews.title: A nice lamp shade
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice shade color- wise. It fits the style of the lamp quite well, and I like the rough texture. I wish it were just a little longer so that I could give it five stars! Overall I am very happy with it and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: punacat

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Looked for drum style lamp shades for way too long before stumbling over these on Amazon. The one and the only thing that isn't represented by the pictures provided was that the weave of the burlap is much looser than it appears. Other than that they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Poirier

customer_reviews.title: Finding the perfect lamp shade is not an easy process
customer_reviews.text: Finding the perfect lamp shade is not an easy process. This one is perfect for my guest room. When it is lit, the texture really stands out and provides a great accent to the room.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful burlap look
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful burlap look, that allows light through, giving nice ambience to room. Fits the lamps easily, looks nice and will likely last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: GF WIFE

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this product is great for the cost. it gives our antique cast iron lamp a great new look.
customer_reviews.author: Maco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality U.S.-made lamp shades
customer_reviews.text: Casual and contemporary at a surprisingly competitive price point, these very nice U.S.-made lamp shades worked perfectly to refresh a pair of vintage ceramic lamps. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: T. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Lamp shade
customer_reviews.text: Perfect new look for my lamp. Arrived in perfect condition and looks wonderful. Gives the right amount of light for great atmosphere. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Just right shade
customer_reviews.text: Matches existing which was the point. Seems to be well made, looks good
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than expected but still works.
customer_reviews.text: It's shorter than I expected. I thought it was 13 inches tall, it's not. But, that's ok because it still covers the light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, they look exactly like the more expensive shades.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like the older ones that were on my grandparents lamps. Work wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: N.Ridenour

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MADE WELL AND LOOKS GREAT ON MY SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS LAMP.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great quality but probs could get a close enough product at target for 2/3rds the price :) satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Baillio

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and the packaging for the shipment was the best I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: J Stephen Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What I received is what I expected. The packaging was great
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Amazon perfectly sent it to Tokyo Japan with doubled corrugated board box.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice texture! When the light turned off, it looks like the photo. But when the light turned on, it looks more and more coarse the texture. Some person refered to in in the review. Anyway, I love both of textures on and off. I bought this to Japan with $33.83 of shipping and handling plus $40.94 the price of it. It was worth. Amazon perfectly sent it to Tokyo Japan with doubled corrugated board box (box in box). Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Steinbach

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The two shades I bought are attractive and just what I needed for my lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: lights up the room, this is what we were looking for
customer_reviews.author: ROY LATIMER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect, it set the lamp off just right.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Bechle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I needed and the color is a soft burlap creamy brown.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our lamps - love the textured look when lit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but it's flimsier than I would have liked. Have the feeling it will cave in while I'm cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: I liked the shade just fine
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shade just fine, but since I bought it I have found several comparable shades at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not look good.
customer_reviews.text: The shade's material looks really cheap. It also very dark. Makes the light very dim. I was disappointed in general and got another shade from target.
customer_reviews.author: Sasan A.

customer_reviews.title: My Lamp is Now Cool.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lampshade. I might get another one, because I can't decide which lamp it looks best on! It definitely brings my lamp(s) into the 21st century. :)
customer_reviews.author: Liz S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lampshade. It's really nice quality and it really makes my floor lamp look great!
customer_reviews.author: Mowpuddy

customer_reviews.title: ... bending it back but it won't look right totally disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast and it was packaged perfectly but when I open the package the shade was totally bent on one side I will be bending it back but it won't look right totally disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gitto

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best looking lamp shade in my house!!! Looks great with the natural tones in my parlor. Will probably buy a matching one. Andy h
customer_reviews.author: Andy Holliday

customer_reviews.title: One line of imperfection in middle of shade, other ...
customer_reviews.text: One line of imperfection in middle of shade, other wise just what I wanted! ( just turned that side to the wall)
customer_reviews.author: Sharon v

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FIT AND LOOK FOR MY NEW LAMPS - PERFECT DESCRIPTION IN AD
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saw in Urbanette home decor issue
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this lamp shade recommended in Urbanette Magazine ([...] - in their reviews section). Great texture and, as Urbanette showed, looks great in mostly any setting. Perfect size for a floor lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Woodstock
